content: We are planning to add ATC codes to SubstanceDefinition / SubstanceReferenceInformation master data elements. According to IDMP 11238, and up until FHIR R5 Preview #1, the ATC codes are/were supposed to be added to the SubstanceReferenceInformation.classification.classification attribute. However, that attribute is missing after FHIR R5 Preview #2, and we are wondering where to put the ATC codes instead (unable to find relevant documentation or examples). Can anyone help? Thank you very much!

@Bernd Moeske this element moved from SubstanceReferenceInformation onto SubstanceDefinition itself: SubstanceDefinition.classification.
To be honest, despite what 11238 says, I would more normally expect an ATC code to be on a medicinal product (MedicinalProductDefinition.classification) and not the substance which may be one if its active ingredients. But that is where it would go.
